ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Trades

Class TradeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Trades.TradeManager

  • public class TradeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a user's trades. Each user will have a TradeManager. The TradeManager will be used when a user creates a new trade, deletes a trade, proposes a counter trade, or changes the status of a trade (accepts or declines the trade). Trade manager works with the TradeArchiver class to store and access a user's trades and with the NotificationManager class to notify

      • pullTrades

        public java.util.ArrayList<Trade> pullTrades()
        Pulls offered trades when user is online. When a user is offline, they will not be able to receive trade offers from other users. When the user is online, this method will be called to update the user's currentTrades ArrayList.
        Returns:
        ArrayList ArrayList of trades that were offered to the user when they were offline
